 * Calculates the potential energy of an object.
 * 
 * @param mass The mass of the object in kilograms.
 * @param height The height of the object above a reference point in meters.
 * @return The potential energy of the object in joules.
 *

 * inaccurate for very high altitudes or on other celestial bodies. For precise calculations,
 * consider using a more accurate value for gravitational acceleration.
 */
public static double potentialEnergy(double mass, double height) {
    return mass * 9.81 * height;
}

public String getStatus() {
    switch (type) {
        case "EuropeanSwallow":
            return "average"; // Average status for European Swallows

            return "unknown"; // Unknown status for other types
    }
}
